div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
In re - Marie Robina Grayson alias Marie Robina vs. } No. 2780 Appearance
To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court:

You will please enter our appearnace as attorneys for Marie Robina Grayson in the above entitled cause, and servce of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon said attorneys, by leaving the same with
div1.ab: Noah Shakespeare and Louis A. Merrick
div1.p: Office Address 2911 Witmory Ave. Everett, Wash.
NOTICE--Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings. Rule 11.
United States District Court Western District of Washington
FILED IN THE U. S. District Court Western Dist. of Washington JUN 27 1914
div1.ab: FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk By EML Deputy
